(Name of Issuer) Class A Ordinary Shares, par value US$0.000006666666667 per share (Title of Class of Securities) G6683N103 (CUSIP Number) December 31, 2021 (Date of Event Which Requires Filing of this Statement) &nbsp; &nbsp; Check the appropriate box to designate the rule pursuant to which this Schedule is filed: &#9744; Rule 13d-1(b) &#9744; Rule 13d-1(c) &#9746; Rule 13d-1(d) &nbsp; * The remainder of this cover page shall be filled out for a reporting person&#146;s initial filing on this form with respect to the subject class of securities, and for any subsequent amendment containing information which would alter the disclosures provided in a prior cover page. The information required in the remainder of this cover page shall not be deemed to be &#147;filed&#148; for the purpose of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#147;Act&#148;) or otherwise subject to the liabilities of that section of the Act but shall be subject to all other provisions of the Act (however, see the Notes). &nbsp; CUSIP Number: G6683N103. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;3. If this statement is filed pursuant to Rule 13d-1(b) or 13d-2(b) or (c), check whether the person filing is a: &nbsp; &nbsp; (a)&nbsp;&#9744; Broker or dealer registered under Section&nbsp;15 of the Act (15 U.S.C. 78o); &nbsp; &nbsp; (b)&nbsp;&#9744; Bank as defined in Section&nbsp;3(a)(6) of the Act (15 U.S.C. 78c); CUSIP No. G6683N103 &nbsp;&nbsp; SCHEDULE 13G &nbsp;&nbsp; Page 7 of 9 &nbsp; &nbsp; (c)&nbsp;&#9744; Insurance company as defined in Section&nbsp;3(a)(19) of the Act (15 U.S.C. 78c); &nbsp; &nbsp; (d)&nbsp;&#9744; Investment company registered under Section&nbsp;8 of the Investment Company Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80a-8); &nbsp; &nbsp; (e)&nbsp;&#9744; An investment adviser in accordance with &#167;240.13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(E); &nbsp; &nbsp; (f)&nbsp;&#9744; An employee benefit plan or endowment fund in accordance with &#167;240.13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(F); &nbsp; &nbsp; (g)&nbsp;&#9744; A parent holding company or control person in accordance with &#167;240.13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(G); &nbsp; &nbsp; (h)&nbsp;&#9744; A savings association as defined in Section&nbsp;3(b) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act (12 U.S.C. 1813); &nbsp; &nbsp; (i)&nbsp;&#9744; A church plan that is excluded from the definition of an investment company under section 3(c)(14) of the Investment Company Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80a-3); &nbsp; &nbsp; (j)&nbsp;&#9744; A non-U.S. institution in accordance with Rule 13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(J); &nbsp; &nbsp; (k)&nbsp;&#9744; Group, in accordance with Rule 13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(K). Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;4. Ownership. Provide the following information regarding the aggregate number and percentage of the class of securities of issuer identified in Item 1. (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information required by Items 4(a) is set forth in Row (9)&nbsp;of the cover page for each Reporting Person and is incorporated herein by reference. (b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information required by Items 4(b) is set forth in Row (11)&nbsp;of the cover page for each Reporting Person and is incorporated herein by reference. Percent of class determined is based on (i) 3,458,439,345 Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares of the Issuer outstanding as reported in the prospectus publicly filed by the Issuer with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#147;SEC&#148;) on December&nbsp;9, 2021 and (ii) 27,555,298 Class&nbsp;A ordinary shares issued by the Issuer as a result of the partial exercise of the underwriters&#146; option to purchase additional shares granted to them in connection with the Issuer&#146;s initial public offering as reported in the Issuer&#146;s Form 6-K filed with the SEC on January&nbsp;6, 2022. Tencent Holdings Limited may be deemed to have beneficial ownership over 272,913,684 Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares held of record by Tencent Cloud Europe B.V., a company incorporated in the Netherlands beneficially owned and controlled by Tencent Holdings Limited through Aceville Pte. Ltd., a company incorporated in Singapore wholly owned by TCH Delta Limited. TCH Delta Limited is a company incorporated in the British Virgin Islands wholly owned by Tencent Holdings Limited. Tencent Holdings Limited may also be deemed to have beneficial ownership over 8,818,920 Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares held of record by Silver Alternative Holding Limited, a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands controlled by Tencent Holdings Limited. (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information required by Items 4(c) is set forth in Rows (5)-(8) of the cover page for each Reporting Person and is incorporated herein by reference. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;5. Ownership of Five Percent or Less of a Class. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;6. Ownership of More than Five Percent on Behalf of Another Person. Not applicable. CUSIP No. G6683N103 &nbsp;&nbsp; SCHEDULE 13G &nbsp;&nbsp; Page 8 of 9 &nbsp; Item&nbsp;7. Identification and Classification of the Subsidiary Which Acquired the Security Being Reported on by the Parent Holding Company or Control Person. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;8. Identification and Classification of Members of the Group. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;9. Notice of Dissolution of Group. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;10. Certification. Not applicable.
